name: Upin Ipin & Friends Kipiblocks
description:
LCGDI and the WALi Studio are proud to present Upin Ipin & Friends KipiBlocks.

Upin & Ipin KipiBlocks is an exciting puzzle game featuring cute and lovable Upin & Ipin characters! Play along with Upin & Ipin and friends!! Tap the characters to match them and get the highest score!!

It's so easy! Swipe the characters to makes lines of 3 or more, and try to get the highest score in 1 minute!! Use special items and things'll really heat up.

How to play:
1: Match 3 or more identical characters.
2: Match the characters Upin Ipin & Friends to make rooms for more blocks to come down.
3: Match them up as fast as you can before the timer runs out.
4: Used some special objects like candy that will crush the blocks
Tips: Used special items to get boost up your score.

Already a fan of Upin Ipin? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Instagram for the latest news:

http://facebook.com/kelabupindanipin

http://instagram.com/upinipinofficial

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Upin Ipin & Friends : KipiBlocks

Lets have fun with Upin Ipin and their Friends on Kipiblocks world
